name: The Trick or Treat Experience (PC Version)
name_original: The Trick or Treat Experience (PC Version)
description:
This is what happens when an amusement park log ride meets the wonderful world of trick or treating!

This game is still in development, and I am currently only looking for criticisms, or suggestions. 

Feel free to leave comments on this page (if that is something itch allows).

Otherwise, you can give me feedback using this google form.

https://forms.gle/468gwL88BeihitqB7
